maqras.text: jabaki aakaash phat jaega
aur vah apane rab kee sunega, aur use yahee chaahie bhee
jab dharatee phaila dee jaegee
aur jo kuchh usake bheetar hai use baahar daalakar khaalee ho jaegee
aur vah apane rab kee sunegee, aur use yahee chaahie bhee
ai manushy! too mashaqqat karata hua apane rab hee kee or khincha chala ja raha hai aur antatah usase milane vaala hai
phir jis kisee ko usaka karm-patr usake daahine haath mein diya gaya
to usase aasaan, sarasaree hisaab liya jaega
aur vah apane logon kee or khush-khush palatega
aur rah vah vyakti jisaka karm-patr (usake baen haath mein) usakee peeth ke peechhe se diya gaya
to vah vinaash (mrtyu) ko pukaarega
aur dahakatee aag mein ja padega
vah apane logon mein magn tha
usane yah samajh rakha tha ki use kabhee palatana nahin hai
kyon nahin, nishchay hee usaka rab to use dekh raha tha
atah kuchh nahin, main qasam khaata hoon saandhy-laalima kee
aur raat kee aur usake samet lene kee
aur chandrama kee jabaki vah poorn ho jaata hai
nishchay hee tumhen manjil par manjil chadhana hai
phir unhen kya ho gaya hai ki eemaan nahin laate
aur jab unhen kuraan padhakar sunaaya jaata hai to sajade mein nahin gir padate
nahin, balki inakaar karanevaale to jhuthalaate hai
haalaanki jo kuchh ve apane andar ekatr kar rahe hai, allaah use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
atah unhen dukhad yaatana kee mangal soochana de do
alabatta jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie unake lie kabhee na samaapt. honevaala pratidaan hai
saakshee hai burjonvaala aakaash
aur vah din jisaka vaada kiya gaya hai
aur dekhanevaala, aur jo dekha gaya
vinasht hon khaeevaale
eedhan bharee aagavaale
jabaki ve vahaan baithe honge
aur ve jo kuchh eemaanavaalon ke saath karate rahe, use dekhenge
unhonne un (eemaanavaalon) se keval is kaaran badala liya aur shatruta kee ki ve us allaah par eemaan rakhate the jo atyant prabhutvashaalee, prashansaneey hai
jisake lie aakaashon aur dharatee kee baadashaahee hai. aur allaah har cheez ka saakshee hai

jin logon ne eemaanavaale purushon aur eemaanavaalee striyon ko sataaya aur aazamaeesh mein daala, phir tauba na kee, nishchay hee unake lie jahannam kee yaatana hai aur unake lie jalane kee yaatana hai
nishchay hee jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie unake lie baag hai, jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hogee. vahee hai badee saphalata
vaastav mein tumhaare rab kee pakad badee hee sakht hai
vahee aarambh karata hai aur vahee punaraavrtti karata hai
vah bada kshamaasheel, bahut prem karanevaala hai
sinhaasan ka svaamee hai, bada gauravashaalee
jo chaahe use kar daalanevaala
kya tumhen un senaon kee bhee khabar pahunchee hain
firaun aur samood kee
nahin, balki jin logon ne inakaar kiya hai, ve jhuthalaane mein lage hue hai
haalaanki allaah unhen ghere hue hai, unake aage-peechhe se
nahin, balki vah to gaurav quraan hai
surakshit pattika mein ankit hai
saakshee hai aakaash, aur raat mein prakat honevaala
aur tum kya jaano ki raat mein prakat honevaala kya hai
damakata hua taara
ki har ek vyakti par ek nigaraanee karanevaala niyukt hai
atah manushy ko chaahie ki dekhe ki vah kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
ek uchhalate paanee se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peeth aur pasaliyon ke madhy se nikalata hai
nishchay hee vah usake lauta dene kee saamarthy rakhata hai
jis din chhipee cheezen parakhee jaengee
to us samay usake paas na to apanee koee shakti hogee aur na koee sahaayak
saakshee hai aavartan (ulat-pher) vaala aakaash
aur phat jaanevaalee dharatee
vah do-took baat hai
vah koee hansee-mazaak nahee hai
ve ek chaal chal rahe hai
aur main bhee ek chaal chal raha hoon
at muhalat de do un inakaar karanevaalon ko; muhalat de do unhen thodee-see
